title: Exposé des faits relatifs au vice Amiral Blanquet du Chayla, en Egypte
description: Armand Blanquet du Chayla (1759-1826) served as second in command of the French squadron during the Battle of the Nile in 1798. During the battle he served gallently, where he was captured by the British though he faced criticism for his tacticaldecisions. This report is from the French Ministère de la Marine that attempts to exonerate du Chayla for his actions at the Battle of the Nile, and was copied in 1855.
subject: Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821 -- Egyptian campaign, 1798-1799; Egypt -- History -- French occupation, 1798-1801; Nile, Battle of the, Egypt, 1798
source: From: Exposé des faits relatifs au vice Amiral Blanquet du Chayla, en Egypte
rights: This item is in the public domain.
